about_the_game:
"Celeste and Luna: Hentai Puzzle 18+" is a puzzle game where players assemble images of girls by rotating puzzle pieces. Once completed, the puzzle appears in the gallery.

The game tells the love story of Celeste and Luna. Both girls attend a vampire school and often cross paths. Sometimes, Celeste spies on Luna by transforming into a bat.

The gameplay is based on progressing through levels. Initially, the girls are shown in modest outfits, but as players advance, more revealing images are unlocked. Throughout the game, the girls flirt with the player, making pleasant sounds. In the gallery, players can activate additional sound effects. (^.^)

Game Features:

  • Hand-drawn artwork.

  • Artwork animations.

  • Voice acting for the characters.

Abilities:

  • Explosion: Blasts several unsolved pieces. Automatically replenishes.

  • Mega Explosion: Blasts a large number of unsolved pieces. Charges as you progress.

  • Aim: Highlights unsolved pieces.

  • Stars: Periodically fall on unsolved pieces to help complete the puzzle.

  • Shadow Hand: Occasionally rotates another piece along with yours.

Gallery:
Players can view collected artwork and activate sound effects here.

Celeste Nightshade

  • Species: Vampire.

  • Appearance: Celeste is a graceful girl with porcelain skin, long black hair with lilac streaks, and glowing red eyes in the dark. She wears corsets and long cloaks with gothic patterns.

  • Personality: Mysterious and a bit reserved. She loves the night sky, books about stars, and romantic tales. Behind her cold exterior lies a tender soul filled with longing and passion.

  • Special Abilities: Celeste can hypnotize and transform into a bat to secretly watch Luna.

Luna Bloodmoor

  • Species: Half-vampire, half-human.

  • Appearance: Luna has white hair with pink tips tied in a stylish ponytail. Her skin has a slight tan, making her stand out among other vampires. She wears short leather dresses and torn stockings.

  • Personality: A bit of a rebel. Luna loves loud parties, motorcycles, and tattoos. However, beneath her bold exterior hides a vulnerable girl afraid to confess her feelings.

  • Special Abilities: Luna can control fire, a rare ability among vampires. She often "accidentally" finds herself near Celeste to protect her.

content_descriptors.notes:
Our game contains explicit adult content, including fully nude characters and sexual activities. The game features:
Explicit Nudity: The characters are depicted fully nude in various stages of undress as the player progresses through the levels.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Intel i7 CPU @ 2.6GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 555 w/ 1GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i5 @ 2.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.9.3
  • Processor: Core i7 @ 2.7GHz+
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated standalone GPU w/ 1GB+ VRAM
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

name: Celeste & Luna: Hentai Puzzle 18+

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel i5 CPU @ 2GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel 4xxx Series w/ 512MB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel i7 CPU @ 2.6GHz or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 555 w/ 1GB VRAM or better
  • Storage: 1500 MB available space

short_description: Dive into the world of mysterious love between two vampire girls as you solve captivating puzzles. Animations, voice acting, and unique abilities will enhance your experience and reveal hidden images of the heroines.
supported_languages:
English*, German*, Spanish - Spain*, Simplified Chinese*, Russian*, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
